result.title: Shared data package for the evaluation challenge and integration with EOSC (M18)
result.description: This rolling deliverable will include the results of tasks 91 92 93 and 94 and it will be regularly updated consisting of the mapped and integrated project data the datasets a subset of the overall project data to be used for the evaluation challenges the anonymization and privacy preserving steps employed to satisfy personal and medical data safety requirements the sharing and integration of these data via EOSC the detailed description of which data will be publicly available in compliance with the EU regulation

result.title: Project ontology and terminology, including data mapper and RDF graph builder (M24)
result.description: This rolling deliverable will include the results of task 91 and 92 and it will be regularly updated consisting of the analysis of the requirements of the use cases a graphical and textual description of the of the ontology the OWL file encoding the ontology a software library to map a selected set of project data into RDF graphs to be released as Linked Open Data since D92 the structural definition of the terminological record together with samples of the terminological records in the standard TermBase eXchange TBX format and translation memories and samples of the machine translated segments in the standard Translation Memory eXchange TMX format since D92 a web application to access the terminology and the translation memories since D92
